channel.title: Need some help trying to run client
channel.description:
Hi I need some help when i try to run any client on my computer i always get this error message
'JAVA' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
any help on this will be greatly appricated

item.title: Need some help trying to run client
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Jayden., post:4, topic:519047”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=637501.msg4297332#msg4297332 date=1368453124]
make sure you have the most up to date java jdk on your computer. Go to uninstall programs and delete any older versions.
[/quote]

I’d hate to say this, but you’re wrong.

It’s due to you not setting your environmental variables – there are numerous tutorials for this.[/quote]Sort of figured so even though on the other hand I did have a similar issue but it was with the client not with the source that’s why I suggested that.

Read full topic
item.source: Need some help trying to run client

item.title: Need some help trying to run client
item.dc:creator: @Jayden2 Jayden.
item.description:
@Jayden2 wrote:

Loveandpower:

make sure you have the most up to date java jdk on your computer. Go to uninstall programs and delete any older versions.

I’d hate to say this, but you’re wrong.

It’s due to you not setting your environmental variables – there are numerous tutorials for this.

Read full topic
